title: Editor's Choice Pictures
text:
U.S. Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez speaks with Maria Isabel Bueso after her testimony about her ongoing medical care in the U.S. at a House Oversight and Reform Civil Rights and Civil Liberties Subcommittee hearing on U.S. President Donald...more

U.S. Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez speaks with Maria Isabel Bueso after her testimony about her ongoing medical care in the U.S. at a House Oversight and Reform Civil Rights and Civil Liberties Subcommittee hearing on U.S. President Donald Trump's administration changes to Medical Deferred Action policies for critically ill children, on Capitol Hill in Washington. REUTERS/Jonathan Ernst

Close
description: The Tribute in Light shines in downtown Manhattan to commemorate the 18th anniversary of September 11, 2001 attacks in New York City. REUTERS/Andrew Kelly
